DOC.brief_title: Vargatef Addition First Line Chemotherapy With Interval Debulking Surgery Patients With Ovarian Cancer
DOC.criteria: First diagnosis histological confirmed ( cytology alone exclude ) epithelial ovarian cancer , fallopian tube primary peritoneal cancer .
